description: This file defines agents and a team for stock research, utilizing OpenAI models and financial tools, and executes a stock price query.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools and roles.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Wraps an OpenAI chat model for use by agents.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with shared configurations.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Provides financial data retrieval tools for agents.

methods.name: team.print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the team based on a prompt, optionally streaming the output.
